name: Upcycled Envelope Set. Boys annuals, Girls annuals and Broons
description:
Pack of three envelope sets, each containing 5 envelopes, notes and labels. 

Handmade in Orkney, Scotland from old books.

The mixed pack will include one of each theme.

Please note: Each envelope is handmade so designs will vary from those shown.

Please note: Each envelope is handmade so designs will vary from those shown.
